ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:03:07 [Issue ID 4000-268346] urn:comicvine:4000-268346 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 03:31:20. [Issue ID 65699]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sam turns to an old friend for help to track down Titania the friend agrees to help as long as Sam returns the pendant to her once he finds it. Sam agrees taking the map and heading to the subway while down there he runs into Tesla, Thom and Sargasso. They are captured and forced to fight giant albino alligators they defeat the evil forces and get the pendant but the Ghost Soldiers show up holding AJ hostage and demanding the pendant.
Issue 4 is previewed at the end of the letter column and in the mark your calendar section. An ad for issue 4 also appears in The Gear Station #1/2 which was also published by Gorilla Comics. Despite this issue #4 was never released.
ComicInfo.Title: Ground Zero: Part 3
